channel.title: Folders for PMs
channel.description:
As a suggestion, I think that folders would be useful so we can organise PMs on these forums.
I'd think that other people who are looking to host and/or play games on these forums would agree with this to an extent as it would help to keep certain things in certain places. For example, I'm probably going to end up having sent around 30 if not more PMs for BtM 1 and I know that there will probably be more than I'm estimating.
I think that while it's a simple thing for the forums, not something too complicated. It's also very useful in general and therefore something I'd recommend without recommending too much at the same time <3 Thanks for reading and/or replying and have a nice day.

Hmm I can’t find a plugin or option for this (then again it’s hard to search for this with generic keywords) – I don’t think it’s possible. If you find a plugin for “Discourse” that does this, feel free to prove me wrong and link it below ;D

item.title: Folders for PMs
item.dc:creator: PokemonKidRyan
item.description:
As a suggestion, I think that folders would be useful so we can organise PMs on these forums.

I’d think that other people who are looking to host and/or play games on these forums would agree with this to an extent as it would help to keep certain things in certain places. For example, I’m probably going to end up having sent around 30 if not more PMs for BtM 1 and I know that there will probably be more than I’m estimating.

I think that while it’s a simple thing for the forums, not something too complicated. It’s also very useful in general and therefore something I’d recommend without recommending too much at the same time <3 Thanks for reading and/or replying and have a nice day.
